comment: I voted Congress all through life as I wanted to see a genuinely secular India . It is sad to see the party of my dreams back hijabi communalists . There is only so much a secular Hindu can stoop . I , very reluctantly , back the modi governmemt on the incidents of the past few days .

comment: Welcome home ! Stand up always for Indian Civilization . India will always be plural if India remains Hindu . If it s character changes to Islamic , it cannot remain secular , forget about it being plural or even tolerating any other ideology ; constitution will be a piece of paper .
